show_name: Dengeki Oshioki Musume Gōtaman R: Ai to Kanashimi no Final Battle (OAV)
other_title: Butt Attack Punisher Girl Gautaman R
臀撃おしおき娘 ゴータマンＲ 愛と悲しみのファイナル・バトル (Japanese)
plot: On her final confrontations with the Black Buddha Gang, Mari Amachi is unable to conceal her secret identity from the few important individuals in her life. Her career as heroine who fights for the freedom of religion is in serious jeopardy as never before.
ending_theme: "Ari no Mama, Kimi no Mama (ありのまま君のまま)" by Noriko Noguchi
